Summary: 1 extremely bright light followed by several other
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the computer in our office when I heard my wife excitedly calling me tocome outside as she could see a UFO. I went outside and saw against the blue skya very bright light followed by 4 other lights some distance behind the leading( the brightest ) light. I told my wife to get the video camera. when shereturned I began filming. It was very hard to see the objects on the LCD screenwith the back light of the sun nevertheless I continued filming while trying tozoom in on the lead object. As it was a hit or miss prospect this wasunsuccessful but after downloading it onto VHS it is clearly visible unzoomed.Filmed it for about 5 minutes. They traversed much of the sky eventuallydisappearing in the clouds in the far distance. During the event we were joinedby others who could see the 1 really bright light just before it passed behindthe distant clouds. Everyone was a little excited as can be heard on the tape.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Tamuning
There were no other sightings in Tamuning on or around August 6th 2001
